opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of June, 2007, the Application for Summary Relief filed by HSP Gaming, LP, is granted. The Petition for Review filed by Petitioners is dismissed for lack of standing pursuant to Society Hill Civic Ass’n v. Pennsylvania Gaming Control Board, — Pa. —, 928 A.2d 175, 2007 WL 1610165 (June 4, 2007). The Application to Lodge filed by Petitioners is denied.
Justice Castille and Saylor dissent. See Society Hill Civic Ass’n v. Pennsylvania Gaming Control Bd., — Pa. —, —, 928 A.2d 175, 185-86, 2007 WL 1610165, *8-9 (June 4, 2007) (Saylor, J., dissenting).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
